summary: Implemented the complete Career domain with JobPosting schema for Google Jobs compliance. Created WorkType and ContractType enums, refactored the careers table migration with new fields (department, work_type, contract_type, salary_range, experience_level, responsibilities/requirements/benefits JSON), updated Career model with getDynamicSEOData() method implementing JobPosting JSON-LD schema using CustomSchema, enhanced CareerResource with Repeater fields for responsibilities/requirements/benefits, created CareerController with show() method, added careers.show route, and built a comprehensive frontend view with hero header, badges, two-column layout (content + sticky sidebar), RTL support, and Tailwind CSS v4. All files pass linting with no errors.
current_status: Career domain implementation complete. All 7 todos finished. Ready for migration execution and testing. The implementation includes Google Jobs-compliant JobPosting schema, Persian labels for enums, Repeater fields in Filament admin, and a fully responsive RTL frontend view.
